mapper.select: SELECT a.order_id, a.payment, a.payment_type, a.status, a.create_time, a.post_fee, a.user_id, a.buyer_message, a.buyer_nick, b.item_id, b.num, b.title, b.price, b.total_fee, b.pic_path, c.receiver_name, c.receiver_phone, c.receiver_mobile, c.receiver_state, c.receiver_city, c.receiver_district, c.receiver_address, c.receiver_zip FROM tb_order a LEFT JOIN tb_order_item b ON a.order_id=b.order_id LEFT JOIN tb_order_shipping c ON a.order_id = c.order_id WHERE a.order_id = #{order_id}
